description:
Look race-ready at stoplights. With sleek one-piece lenses and an aggressive wrap, the Dimension Sunglasses are built for speed.

  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • Flexible, light and strong TR90 temples
  • 8-base curvature helps protect you from light coming in at angles and blocks wind when the pace picks up
  • Rubber temple tips and nose pads offer a comfortable fit that doesn’t shift around when you drop the hammer
  • 2 styles are treated with a military grade anti-fog material to keep you fog-free. Anti-fog lenses perform at their best when clean. Simply wash the lenses with water and they’ll keep your vision clear. When not in use, anti-fog lenses are happiest stored in a warm, dry environment
name: MEC Dimension Sunglasses - Unisex
